pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gemas is a simple code editor for GNUstep. It have autoindentation and highlight syntax for C, C++, Objective-C, Objective-C++, GSmarkup. And to edit Strings, Plist, GNUmakefile, ChangeLog files and plain text files (INSTALL, README, ...)
